name: ST Insert Post
author: Shayne Thiessen

sections.description:
A simple front end post form for all users, and as a bonus the ability to list subpages.

Just insert [st_insert_post] into a page to display the front end post form.
To list a pages subpages, just insert [stls] into a page.
Simple eh?
sections.installation:
1. Unzip plugin files and upload them under your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’

  2. Activate plugin
sections.faq:
Got a question? Ask it at our official forums over at mystickypost.com
http://mystickypost.com/groups/wordpress/forum/topic/st-insert-post-plugin/
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fixed CSS issues

1.0.2

  • Added automatic redirects to error messages

1.0.1

  • Cleaned up the code and shrunk plugin size

1.0.0

  • Initial release
